meta.label: Export Relationships
meta.description:
Create Neo4j relationships from a Dataiku Dataset.
Each row of a dataset should represent a relationship (A)-[rel:REL]->(B). 
Only one A->B relationship should exist in the input dataset for a given a and b; otherwise they'll be merged into one. 
Note that the nodes must have been created first.
